Class PlayerThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu.server.PlayerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class PlayerThread extends Thread
Handles the connection for each connected player(client).
